text: khanditavagiyu allahanu visvasigalinda avara jivagalannu mattu avara sottugalannu kharidisiruvanu – avarige svargavannu nidalikkagi. Avaru allahana margadalle horaduttare, vadhisuttare mattu vadhisalpaduttare. Taurat, injil mattu kur‌an‌nalli avarige nidalagiruva vagdanavu satyavagide. Allahaniginta uttamavagi tanna kararannu palisuvavanu yariddane? Addarinda avana jote nivu madikondiruva vyavaharakkagi sambhramisiri. Idu nijakku maha vijayavagide
